sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO dms_tb_receipt ( RECEIPT_NO, SHOP_ID, TRADE_ID, TYPE, STATE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER ) VALUES ( #receiptNo#, #shopId#, #tradeId#, #type#, 'U', NOW(), #modifyUser#, NOW(), #modifyUser# )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
sqlMap.select: SELECT t.receipt_id AS receiptId, t.receipt_no AS receiptNo, DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS createDate FROM dms_tb_receipt t WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.shop_id = #shopId# AND t.trade_id = #tradeId# ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
